titleStmt.title: The unhappy favourite, or, The Earl of Essex a tragedy : acted at the Theatre Royal by Their Majesty's servants / written by John Bankes.
titleStmt.author: Banks, John, d. 1706.
Dryden, John, 1631-1700.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Bentley and Mary Magnes ...,

notesStmt.note: Prologues by Major Mohun, John Dryden and the author. Epilogue also by Dryden.
Later editions appeared under title: The Earl of Essex, or, The unhappy favourite.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
